actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States, clause 1, section 2 of article 2 (relating to the pardoning powers of the President).

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that with respect to clause 1, section 2 of article 2 (relating to the pardoning powers of the President), the President shall have the power to act only after an individual has been convicted of offenses against the United States and sentenced therefor.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States, clause 1, section 2 of article 2 (relating to the pardoning powers of the President).
